name: Plate Tectonix
description:
Play the game and beat the evil monsters and become the greatest hero of Plate Tectonics! Answer the questions on every levels in 3 maps of difficulties and earn a pet after the game!

***This was my first freelance game. The game was a project and designed by the students of Rizal Technological University. The sprites was not mine and my friend programmed the map of this game.
